card.name: Adria
card.property: Each time you pay Adria's revive cost, place the cards you used face down beneath her instead of discarding them. Purge 3 cards from beneath Adria -- Gain 1 power. You may ready Adria.

card.name: Amaterasu
card.property: Amaterasu gets revive cost -1 for each other Goa'uld adversary. Each time you assign Amaterasu, you may turn an obstacle face down (it becomes a complication). If you do, gain power equal to its cost minus one.

card.name: Anubis
card.property: At the end of your opponent's turn, if they have no power remaining, place a hegemony counter on Anubis. Failure: If Anubis has three or more hegemony counters on him, you win the game.

card.name: Armin Selig
card.property: While Armin Selig is ready, each time your opponent plays a mission, you may draw a card. When you place this adversary card in your discard pile (for any reason), your opponent loses 1 power.

card.name: Cassius
card.property: Each time your opponent would place one or more cards into their discard pile, you may stop Cassius. If you do, your opponent purges those cards instead. Failure: Purge a card from your opponent's discard pile.

card.name: Cunning Queen
card.property: Each time you assign Cunning Queen, your opponent must draw a card. Then, they may draw a second. If they do, they may draw a third. Then, for each card they have drawn this way, gain 1 power.

card.name: The Doci
card.property: Purge the Doci from your hand, pay X power -- If you are the villain player, choose an Ori obstacle or an Ori adversary in your discard pile whose cost is X. Play it from there at no cost. Destroy the Doci, pay 3 power -- Choose an Ori obstacle to get dominion.

card.name: Fenrir
card.property: Victory: Your opponent may stop a character. If they don't, destroy a gear. Failure: You may ready a villain ship., If you achieved victory during this mission's ship battle, you may ready Fenrir.

card.name: First
card.property: Each time you assign First, you may reveal a Replicator card from your hand and place it face down beneath him. While First is assigned, for each card beneath him, he counts as one additional replicator card.

card.name: Frank Simmons
card.property: While this adversary card is in your villain score pile, Political obstacles cost power -1 to play. When you place this adversary card in your discard pile (for any reason), you may take a Political obstacle or an NID card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Hathor
card.property: Purge Hathor from your hand, pay 3 power -- Stop a team character. Purge Hathor from your hand, pay 6 power -- Incapacitate a team character. This ability costs power -1 to activate for each stopped support character.

card.name: Kiva
card.property: Outlaw. Purge Kiva from your hand -- Chose one effect that will last until the end of the current mission: Complications cost power -1 to play; or each time you play a complication, your opponent discards a random card. When you play Kiva, stop a hero ship.

card.name: Na'onak
card.property: Purge Na'onak from your hand, pay 3 power -- If you are the villain player, until the end of the current mission, to assign a character, your opponent must stop another character. Failure: Incapacitate an assigned or stopped team character.

card.name: Oberoth
card.property: Purge Oberoth from your hand -- If you are the villain player, choose power or threat, then, for each Replicator card at the current mission, drain 1. If you have chosen power, gain 1 power for each Replicator card you drained this way. If you have chosen threat, take into hand each Replicator card you drained this way.

card.name: Orhuk
card.property: Orhuk gets difficulty +1 while a villain Jaffa ship or a Goa'uld ship is assigned. Each time you assign Orhuk, you may destroy an assigned support character whose contributed skill is lower than Orhuk's difficulty.

card.name: Osiris
card.property: Purge Osiris from your hand -- If you are the villain player, and if a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, gain 2 power. Purge Osiris from your hand, pay 3 power -- If a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, destroy a support character. Failure: Stop a character.

card.name: Osric
card.property: Each time you assign Osric, you may choose to give him difficulty 2 until the end of the current mission. Success: you may drain 3. If you do, purge Osric and play an adversary at no cost.

card.name: Rak'an
card.property: Each time you assign Rak'an, your opponent must reveal four random cards from their hand. You pay pay 1 power for each support character this revealed. If you do, your opponent discards them. Gain 1 power for each Tok'ra character this discarded.

card.name: Robert Kinsey
card.property: Purge Robert Kinsey from your hand, pay X+1 power -- If you are the villain player, search your deck for a Political obstacle that costs X, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck. Then, you may pay that obstacle at no cost. Failure: Gain 1 power for each stopped team character.

card.name: Selkhet
card.property: Each time a triggered effect would trigger, you may stop Selkhet. If you do, that effect is not triggered.(Success, failure, and victory texts are the most common triggered effects.)

card.name: Solemn Prior
card.property: At the end of your opponent's power phase, if this adversary card is in your villain score pile, for each Ori adversary card in your villain score pile, draw a card, then place a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Svarog
card.property: Each time you assign Svarog, choose a team character whose game text becomes blank until the end of the current mission. Failure: Incapacitate the chosen character.

card.name: Talus
card.property: While Talus is assigned, he gets: "Stop a Replicator adversary -- Play a Replicator obstacle at no cost. You can do this only once each turn." Failure: You may take a Replicator adversary card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Tanis Reynard
card.property: Outlaw. As an action, you may take a card from beneath Tanis Reynard and place it face down at the current mission (it becomes a complication). Failure: Place a card from your hand face down beneath Tanis Reynard.

card.name: Wraith Eradicator
card.property: While Wraith Eradicator is assigned, to assign a character, your opponent must choose one: discard a random card; or drain 2. Failure: Destroy each ready support character.

card.name: Wraith Progenitor
card.property: While this adversary card is in your villain score pile, Wraith adversaries cost power -1 to play. Discard a Wraith adversary -- Play a Wraith obstacle at no cost. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Wraith Queen
card.property: Purge Wraith Queen from your hand, pay 2 power -- If you are the villain player, your opponent must drain 4, or drain 6 if there is an assigned Wraith adversary. Choose a villain card among the drained cards, and gain power equal to its cost. Failure: Destroy a support character.

card.name: Baldr
card.property: Each time you play an Asgard support character, you may stop Baldr. If you do, gain 1 power.

card.name: Batu
card.property: During each mission's ship battle, if Batu is assigned with a Jaffa hero ship, you get total firepower +1.

card.name: Bra'tac
card.property: Discard Bra'tac from your hand, pay 1 power -- If the current mission is a Culture or a Combat mission, it gets difficulty -1.

card.name: Brightman
card.property: Discard Brightman from your hand, pay X+1 power -- Destroy a Science obstacle at the current mission that costs X.

card.name: Coughlin
card.property: Stop Coughlin -- Block an adversary from the current mission. You may pay 3 power. If you do, ready Coughlin.

card.name: Darren Becker
card.property: Discard Darren Becker from your hand, pay 1 power -- Choose a support character. They get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. If the chosen character is Destiny, this ability costs power -1 to activate.

card.name: Delex
card.property: Discard Delek from your hand, pay X+1 power -- Destroy a Culture obstacle at the current mission that costs X.

card.name: Elizabeth Weir
card.property: Discard Elizabeth Weir from your hand, pay 3 power -- If you are the hero player, look at one card from the top of your mission pile for each ready Atlantis character. Place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Evan Lorne
card.property: Discard Evan Lorne from your hand -- Destroy a complication.

card.name: George Hammond
card.property: Discard George Hammond from your hand, pay 4 power -- If you are the hero player, ready each assigned SGC team character. While George Hammond is ready, each time you succeed at a mission, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Halling
card.property: Discard Halling from your hand, pay 3 power -- Unblock a character. When you place Halling in your discard pile (for whatever reason), draw a card.

card.name: Harmony
card.property: Missions get difficulty +1. Success: Gain 3 power and draw 2 cards. Failure: Destroy Harmony.

card.name: Harold Maybourne
card.property: Discard Harold Maybourne from your hand, pay 1 power -- If the current mission is a Science or an Ingenuity mission, it gets difficulty -1.

card.name: Kelmaa
card.property: Discard Kelmaa from your hand, pay 3 power -- If you are the hero player, take an event card from your discard pile into hand. If that event card is Tok'ra, this ability costs power -1 to activate.

card.name: Kiselev
card.property: Discard Kiselev from your hand -- Gain 1 power for each failed mission. To assign Kiselev, pay 4 power and discard a card. While Kiselev is assigned, each other Russian character gets skills +1.

card.name: Luciano
card.property: Discard Luciano from your hand, pay 1 power -- If you are the hero player, choose one: Ready an assigned character; or ready two assigned NID characters. Luciano costs power -1 to play for each NID character with a glyph.

card.name: Malcolm Barrett
card.property: Discard Malcolm Barrett from your hand, pay 1 power -- If you are the hero player, draw a card for each obstacle and each complication at the current mission. Stop Malcolm Barrett -- Your opponent loses 1 power.

card.name: Michael Griff
card.property: Discard Michael Griff from your hand, pay X+1 power -- Destroy a Combat obstacle at the current mission that costs X.

card.name: Morrison
card.property: Each time you would place one or more cards from your hand into your discard pile, you may stop Morrison. If you do, discard twice that many cards from the top of your deck instead (the cards you were about to discard stay in your hand).

card.name: M'zel
card.property: While M'zel is assigned, Jaffa support characters cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Ronon Dex
card.property: Discard Ronon Dex from your hand, pay 4 power -- Choose one: Destroy an assigned Wraith adversary; or destroy a ready adversary. When you play Ronon Dex, he is blocked from the current mission.

card.name: Sergei Ivanov
card.property: Each time you would place a support character in your discard pile, you may stop Sergei Ivanov and pay 1 power. If you do, take that support character into hand instead.

card.name: Shaq'rel
card.property: Discard Shaq'rel from your hand, pay 4 power -- If you are the hero player, choose a character and ready them. If the chosen character is Jaffa, this ability costs power -1 to play.

card.name: Teyla Emmagan
card.property: Discard Teyla Emmagan from your hand,, pay 2 power -- Choose an Atlantis team character to get skills +1 for each glyph they have, until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Vanessa James
card.property: Discard Vanessa James from your hand, pay X+1 power -- Destroy an Ingenuity obstacle at the current mission that costs X.

card.name: Wilson
card.property: Discard Wilson from your hand -- If you are the hero player, and if your opponent has discarded at least one card during the current mission, choose one: Gain 1 power; or draw two cards. Success: Your opponent gets total firepower -1 during the next ship battle this turn.

card.name: Aegir
card.property: Victory: For each glyph Aegir has and each assigned Asgard ship, you may shuffle a random card from your discard pile into your deck. Scorpius or Triangulum: Aegir gets "Victory: The current mission gets difficulty -1 for each different glyph Aegir has."

card.name: Cameron Mitchell
card.property: Discard three cards -- Gain 1 power and draw a card. You can do this only once each turn. Libra: Cameron Mitchell's first ability costs you one less card to discard. Scorpius: You can use Cameron Mitchell's first ability one more time each turn.

card.name: Carson Beckett
card.property: Orion or Scorpius: Each time your opponent plays a Disease or a Science obstacle, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready Carson Beckett. Orion and Scorpius: Each time you ready Carson Beckett with his first ability, you may pay 1 power. If you do, ready another character with 2 Science or more.

card.name: Chaka
card.property: Gemini: Chaka gets skills +1 while Daniel Jackson or another character who has no affiliation traits is assigned. Pisces: Chaka gets: "Success: The next mission this turn costs power +1 to play and gets difficulty -1."

card.name: Daniel Jackson
card.property: Gemini or Pisces, Pay 2 power and discard a card -- Daniel Jackson's Combat is added to his Culture and Ingenuity until the end of the current mission. You can do this only once each turn. Gemini: Daniel Jackson gets Combat +1. Pisces: Daniel Jackson gets Combat +1.

card.name: Daria Voronkova
card.property: Orion or Triangulum, Purge a Russian card from your discard pile -- Gain 1 power for each glyph Daria Voronkova has. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Eli Wallace
card.property: Scorpius: Gears cost power -1 to play. Triangulum: Hero ships cost power -1 to play. Scorpius and Triangulum: Eli Wallace gets Culture +1, Ingenuity +1, and grit.

card.name: Everett Young
card.property: Grit. Each time you assign a hero ship to a mission that has a glyph matching one of Everett Young's, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready Everett Young.

card.name: Gerak
card.property: Each time you assign Gerak to a mission that has a glyph matching one of his, you may pay 2 power. If you do, choose a Jaffa support character for each glyph he has. The chosen support characters each get skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Hank Landry
card.property: While Hank Landry is assigned, each other SGC character who has at least one glyph matching one of Hank Landry's gets skills +1 for each different glyph they share.

card.name: Jennings
card.property: Libra or Scorpius: Each time your opponent discards one or more cards from their hand, you may draw a card. Libra and Scorpius: Each time you discard one or more cards from your hand, you may draw a card.

card.name: Jolinar
card.property: Pisces: Jolinar gets point value +1. Scorpius: Jolinar gets point value +1. Pisces and Scorpius: Jolinar gets Combat +1, Ingenuity +1, and point value +1.

card.name: Jonas Quinn
card.property: Gemini: Jonas Quinn gets Science +1 and Combat +1. Libra: Jonas Quinn Culture +1 and Ingenuity +1. Gemini and Libra: Jonas Quinn gets Combat +1 and Ingenuity +1.

card.name: Martin Edwards
card.property: Pisces or Scorpius: Each time you play a Combat mission, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready Martin Edwards. Pisces and Scorpius: Martin Edwards gets skills +1 for each assigned adversary.

card.name: Peter Grodin
card.property: Libra or Orion: Each time you assign Peter Grodin, gain 1 power, plus 1 power for each different glyph he has. Spend this power only to activate abilities on your gears or on Peter Grodin. Pay X power -- Look at the top X cards of your deck and place them on its top and/or bottom in any order. If X was two or more, draw a card.

card.name: Rodney McKay
card.property: Libra or Scorpius: While Rodney McKay is ready or assigned, you may perform the following action: "Stop a gear -- Ready a hero ship." Libra and Scorpius, stop Rodney McKay, stop X gears -- Gain X power. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: "Tyler"
card.property: While "Tyler" is ready or assigned, you can use a "Tyler" character card in your hand to boost any team character. Gemini or Pisces: "Tyler" gets Combat +1. Gemini and Pisces: At the start of your debrief phase, you may pay X power to take X+1 "Tyler" character cards from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: A Noble Death
card.property: To play this event, purge an assigned support character and discard a card. Destroy an obstacle or an assigned adversary at the current mission. If the purged support character was Tok'ra or SGC, you may draw a card.

card.name: I'm In
card.property: Choose an assigned character with a glyph. The next obstacle your opponent plays during this mission costs power +1 to play for each glyph the chosen character has.

card.name: Inspiration
card.property: To play this event, discard a card. Choose a hero card in your discard pile whose cost is lower than the discarded card, and take it into hand. Purge this event.

card.name: Magnified Intellect
card.property: Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw two cards, plus one card for each assigned character with a glyph. At the end of the current mission, draw cards until you have eight cards in hand.

card.name: Meticulous Research
card.property: Draw a card. When you place this event card in your discard pile (for any reason), gain 1 power, then purge it.

card.name: Preflight Checks
card.property: To play this event, block a team character from the current mission. You may assign a hero ship. If you do, it gets firepower +X, where X is equal to the blocked character's Combat or Science, whichever is higher.

card.name: Quetzalcoatl's Revelation
card.property: To play this event, discard one to five cards. This event costs power -1 to play for each card you discarded. Ready and/or unblock a character.

card.name: Staff Weapon Barrage
card.property: To play this event, stop any number of characters with 1 Combat or more. Stop an assigned adversary whose difficulty is equal to or lower than the total Combat of the stopped characters. If each stopped character is Jaffa, you may pay 3 power. If you do, destroy that adversary.

card.name: Asgard Gate Controller
card.property: Except for the first mission you play each turn, each time you play a mission, gain 1 power.

card.name: Atlantis Patch
card.property: Your Atlantis characters get skills +1 for each successful mission this turn.

card.name: Destiny Armored Suit
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 2 power -- Remove the failure text from a Combat or Ingenuity obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Destiny Gate Controls
card.property: Each time you would draw one or more cards during the mission phase, you may stop this gear. If you do, drain that same number of cards instead, then gain 1 power for each card drained this way.

card.name: Escape Pod
card.property: Stop an assigned hero ship, purge this gear -- Ready a character.

card.name: Holographic Database
card.property: Each time you would draw one or more cards during the mission phase, you may stop this gear and pay 1 power. If you do, draw twice as many cards instead, then place half of the drawn cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Repair Drone
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 2 power -- Choose an incapacitated hero ship. It becomes stopped (it is no longer incapacitated). Stop this gear, pay 2 power -- Ready a stopped hero ship.

card.name: Safe House
card.property: At the start of your debrief phase, if there have been no failed missions this turn, you may pay 1 power and destroy a gear, then place it face down beneath this gear. You get experience +1 for each card beneath this gear.

card.name: Transporter Beacon
card.property: Stop and destroy this gear, pay 3 power -- Discard your hand. Draw a card for each card you discarded this way. This costs power -1 to activate for each NID character with a glyph.

card.name: Ambuscade
card.property: When you play this obstacle, discard any number of villain cards. Stop an assigned character whose contributed skill is equal to the number of cards you discarded.

card.name: Annunciation
card.property: To play this obstacle, you may reveal an Ori adversary card in your hand to your opponent. If you do,this obstacle costs power -1 to play.

card.name: Bargaining Chip
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a support character. They are stopped. Each time your opponent assigns a character, they may discard a card. If they don't, destroy the chosen character.

card.name: Brain Hacking
card.property: When you play this obstacle, for each other Replicator card at the current mission, your opponent discards a card. Each time your opponent places a villain card in their discard pile, you gain 1 power.

card.name: Breached Defenses
card.property: Victory: You may pay 2 power. If you do, stop an assigned character. If you don't, destroy a gear.

card.name: Caught in the Crossfire
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a support character with no affiliation trait. They are blocked. Failure: Destroy the chosen character.

card.name: Coerced Photo Op
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent loses 2 power.

card.name: Destruction of Evidence
card.property: Each time your opponent would place a card in their discard pile, they purge it instead. Failure: Your opponent loses 2 power.

card.name: Distorted Recollection
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. They get skills -1 for each glyph they have, until the end of the current mission. Failure: Your opponent loses 2 power.

card.name: Doomed Ship
card.property: When you play this obstacle, for each other Replicator card at the current mission, you may discard a card. If you do, draw as many cards as you discarded this way. Failure: Destroy a hero ship.

card.name: Enduring Menace
card.property: When you play this obstacle, for each other Replicator card at the current mission, choose a Replicator card in your discard pile. Shuffle all but one of the chosen cards into your deck, then place the remaining chosen card on top of your deck.

card.name: Hasty Retreat
card.property: Success text on hero cards is optional. To use the success text on a character or a mission, your opponent must pay 1 power.

card.name: Hunter's Catch
card.property: To play this event, stop any number of characters with 1 Combat or more. Stop an assigned adversary whose difficulty is equal to or lower than the total Combat of the stopped characters. If each stopped character is Jaffa, you may pay 3 power. If you do, destroy that adversary.

card.name: Interdimensional Parasite
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play for each Ancient gear. Failure: Destroy a support character.

card.name: Jumbled Mind
card.property: Each time your opponent discards a card from their hand, place a confusion counter on this obstacle. This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each confusion counter on it.

card.name: Obstruction
card.property: To play this obstacle, you must stop a Political adversary. Failure: You may ready a Political adversary.

card.name: Ori Transport Rings
card.property: Dominion. This obstacle costs power -1 to play while an Ori ship is assigned.

card.name: Parasitic Entity
card.property: When you play this obstacle, discard any number of villain cards. Stop an assigned character whose contributed skill is equal to the number of cards you discarded.

card.name: Power Grab
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent may discard up to four cards. Then, gain power equal to four minus the number of cards they discarded this way.

card.name: Prison Escort
card.property: Your opponent must pay 1 power to perform the boost action. Failure: Your opponent can't perform the boost action until the end of the turn.

card.name: Sarcophagus Madness
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a team character. Each time this character would become assigned, you may discard a card to block them from the current mission instead.Their owner may perform this action: "Destroy a support character -- Destroy this obstacle."

card.name: Self-Indulgence
card.property: Each time your opponent discards a card from their hand, gain 1 power. Each time your opponent draws a card, gain 1 power.

card.name: Smirking Escape
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may ready an assigned adversary. Success: Shuffle up to five random cards from your discard pile into your deck. If an adversary is assigned, choose up to five cards from your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck instead.

card.name: Sokar's Wrath
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may discard up to three cards. Then, your opponent must discard the same number of cards.

card.name: Stargate Destroyer
card.property: Failure: Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Science/Combat/Ingenuity): Your opponent may pay 2 power. If they don't, assign this obstacle to the current mission (it's no longer prepared).

card.name: Stolen Stargate
card.property: The next time your opponent passes, they can do nothing but pass until the end of this mission.

card.name: Suppressing DIssidence
card.property: Failure: Stop X characters and purge X cards from your opponent's discard pile, where X is equal to the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Surrounded
card.property: To play this obstacle, you must discard zero to three cards. This obstacle costs power -1 to play for each card you discarded this way. When you play this obstacle, choose a character. They are blocked.

card.name: Terror from Above
card.property: Withdraw 2. This obstacle costs power -1 to play for each assigned Wraith ship. Failure: Your opponent destroys a support character for each assigned Wraith ship.

card.name: Ticking Bomb
card.property: After each time they act, your opponent chooses one: Discard a random card; or lose 1 power. Failure: Incapacitate a team character and stop each other team character.

card.name: Tribute to Apophis
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a Goa'uld adversary is assigned. . When you play this obstacle, you may choose a stopped team character. Failure: Choose one: Incapacitate the chosen team character, or destroy a stopped support character.

card.name: Gerak's Ha'tak
card.property: This ship gets firepower +2 while you have 4 or more remaining power. Victory: You may pay X power. If you do, choose a non-Ori obstacle at this mission that costs X and turn it face down (it becomes a complication).

card.name: Khonsu's Ha'tak
card.property: During your opponent's turn, this ship becomes a villain ship. Victory: You may pay power equal to an assigned character's contributed skill. If you do, ready them.

card.name: Puddle Jumper
card.property: After you and your opponent have both passed at the current mission, but before its resolution, if this ship is ready and unblocked, you pay pay 1 power and discard a card. If you do, assign it to the current mission.

card.name: The Sun Tzu
card.property: This ship gets firepower +1 while a Russian ship is assigned. Each time you assign a Russian ship, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready this ship.

card.name: Apophis' Battleship
card.property: When you play this ship, incapacitate it. Victory: You may pay 2 power. If you do, your opponent may destroy a hero ship. If they don't, stop a character. Failure: Gain 2 power.

card.name: Michael's Cruiser
card.property: Victory: Your opponent must drain 3. The current mission gets difficulty +1 for each character card among the drained cards.

card.name: Naglfar
card.property: At the end of your opponent's power phase, stop this ship unless you drain 3. While this ship is ready or assigned, missions get difficulty +1.

card.name: Weaponized Stargate
card.property: Each time your opponent assigns a ship, place a charge counter on this ship. This ship gets firepower +1 for each charge counter on it. Victory: For each charge counter on this ship, you destroy that counter and your opponent discards a card.
